name: Courtney Jones
text:
My kids and I stumbled into this store today on a quest to find secondhand furniture for my son’s bedroom.  When I opened the door and saw all of the gorgeous, high quality decor and gifts I immediately looked at my kids and said, “DON’T TOUCH ANYTHING!” The owner, Lulu, immediately welcomed us like family and took my three boys on a journey through her store. She and my oldest became fast friends as they bonded over all the crystals, gemstones, and fossils.
This store is such a unique place full of gorgeously, curated pieces at every price point. We will be going back ASAP because I’m kicking myself for not buying a piece of wall decor that I want and also because we want to hang out with Lulu again!

resp.text: Omg .. you and your family are amazing warm   hearted people ♥.  I enjoy hanging out.  You all are welcome anytime 😊.  Looking forward to seeing you guys soon.  God bless 🙏

name: opal armistead
text: Amazing inventory! Very eclectic mix that guarantees you won't walk out of the doors empty handed. If you're looking for that one of a kind conversation piece,  this is the place to be! Definitely recommend to my friends.

name: Scot Reeves
text: This place is truly amazing. Beautiful, interesting things curated from all over the world. Definitely worth a stop. The owner is an absolute delight. One of my favorite places.

name: Mona Davidson
text: Absolutely loved this little place! The owner was wonderful as well, so friendly, knowledgeable & helpful. I am in love with the 2 rings I bought and can't wait to go back.

name: Matt Moss
text: This place has something for everyone!  The shop owner is amazing and has an eye for everything BEAUTIFUL.  You wont be disappointed.  Stop in and say hello.

name: Brittany Sasser
text: I absolutely LOVE this store!! There is literally something for everyone. When you walk in, you feel better. It’s a truly magical place!!

name: wanda white
text: Great place to browse. Super friendly

name: Breanna Furline
text: The best jewelry and unique items! Also the owner is the sweetest!! Some of my most favorite jewelry pieces are from. Gypsy!

name: Krys Smith
text: This store has something for everyone! It has such a fun eclectic vibe and LuLu is such a beautiful person.

name: Tania Worthey
text: Owner reached out to ask what could be improved. Loved that. Had to edit my rating.

name: Britney Pierre
text: I love this shop! My favorite is the jewelry! The owner is the sweetest, a must visit!

name: Brenna Bonner
text: This is a Beautiful store full of treasures with wonderful customer service from Lulu! 👑

name: Lin Obeid
text: Good customer service, friendly prices and clean!

name: Brandy Robinson
text: Love this shop and the owner!!

name: Dayana Pickard
text: Will not be disappointed!!!!

name: Joel Bittner
text: If I knew they were tossing out more stuff then they put up I would just go to the dumpster to shop. If people only knew where there stuff goes it would be a lot less stuff in the store. Although they have good prices I will still shop there I really thank they should not do what they do to surplus stuff but don’t toss it in the dumpster put it in a bin for sale  a dime a bag sounds good!!!

resp.text: We only throw away stuff that is btoken or stained  and we appreciate  your concern ty

name: Julie Bartlett
text: Make sure you know all the POLICIES before you shop. Having to use an in store credit within 2 weeks is ridiculous. 1. they all ready have the money , 2. the type of shop it is they may not have anything you want in that time span, 3. yes they have expenses, but all the merchandise is pure profit so........, 4. if you don't find anything you want in 2 weeks they get paid for selling nothing. They have lost a customer

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way most thrift stores dont even do credit  but now we dont do returns

name: Jessica Thornton
text: Went to check out some baby items they had outside and it was filthy and was not clean at all. Your charging 80.00 for a stroller and carseat make sure you clean it it up a little. Was very disappointed on the items. Yeah I could of went home and clean it but if I'm paying that price (cheaper than Walmart) I would think they would of clean it.

resp.text: Sorry i will mention it to my staff sorry for any inconvenience

name: Mary Duncan
text: Very nice smiley and happy staff. Very crowded but with a lot of things to look at and buy.

resp.text: Ty hope to see you again

name: KC Lombard
text: I adore this thrift store! I live in Charleston SC and every time we visit Eufaula, it is a must stop! Sometimes more than once! Great bargains for quality things! Renee and her family are super nice and will help you any way they can!

resp.text: Ty your so sweet

name: Patricia Ann
text: Always enjoy going  there.

resp.text: Ty good to see you always

text: Neat and disappointing.

resp.text: Sorry hopefully something we can do

text: Pretty  nice selection and good customer service

resp.text: Ty we love too help in anyway

text: It has most of what I was looking for. And I enjoy just shopping with them.

name: Jesse Anderson
text: Bought a dryer. Brought it home. Shook and was very loud and smelled the belt burning. Took it back. Got another dryer. Guy tried not to pay me back the difference from the first higher priced dryer. Got the second dryer home. Squeaks so loud u can't stand to be home with it. Seriously? Was told they had just tried this one out that day and it was "pretty quiet"

resp.text: did you let them know about second dryer  if so did you get a refund. i am the one of the owners and would like to know. they have 30 day warranty should not have been and issue. we gave her a refund with no issues

name: Sebastian Bruner
text: Very friendly and helpful. Good prices. Will visit again!

name: wendy hillis
text: Love this place and great deals

name: Classic Sutton
text: Great prices

name: Xavier Clayton
text: Highly recommended if you want to get quality product without paying a new appliance price.

name: Kametrice Ming
text: I have been purchasing used appliances here since 2011. I have been very satisfied with the customer service the owner provides as well as  the appliances ranging from washer, dryer and refrigerator i have purchased over the years! I recommend going here for appliances needed at a low cost that last for years is my experience!!

name: Stephanie Webster
text: Fair prices quick delivery and amazing help from the young men working there!  Definitely reccomend!

name: Robert Naquin
text: Cool ppl

name: Ms Melody Rhines
text: Mr Mack such a blessed man of the community, willing to work with everyone and he's kind yet still the businessman

name: Demetra Helms
text: Very unprofessional and never on time. Would not recommend at all

name: jonathan sexton
text: Macks had some really unique peices. Its kinda small but a cool place to check out.

name: Joyce Baxley
text: Friendly,  great service,  great prices

name: James Glover
text: Used appliances some time you get one that will last and sometimes you don't most frogs. Around $125,washers about the same.

name: Vina Clark
text: They hit my car while delivering appliances and the owner tried to bam boosile me

name: Jim Brodzinski
text: Went there 2x to find parts. He was extremely rude, unprofessional and just plain hateful. He showed me a refrigerator door that was bad but would not even let me look at the one  1 foot away , to see if it was any better. I will never go back there again.

name: Timothy Bailey
text: Very friendly and helpful we will be back to pick up our stove and fridge when they call

name: Mitchell Severson
text: Very helpful

name: Cynthia Haney (Cindy)
text: I love this store and all  the Dixie Belle and prima design supplies they have, great store to shop and excellent store managers.  ❤️🦋

name: Sean K
text: The Junque Market is a great shop with a little something for everyone. You can find everything there from gifts, man cave items, furniture, vintage items, antiques, and records just to name a few. The atmosphere is awesome and very welcoming. I would highly recommend a visit to The Junque Market.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of The Junque Market.

name: PEP-HER Makeup Artistry
text: This is a great shop! The owners Sean and Brandi are so friendly, there is a wide range of items you can find here: furniture,jewelry, painting/wall art, clothing,candles, and more!

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words, Saysha! Thank you so much!

name: Sherry Wray
text: Great store!  Antiques & farmhouse signs furniture jewelry and Dixie Belle paints.  I was so excited about the paints!

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful review, Sherry! We appreciate you taking the time out of your day to praise our shop. As a token of gratitude, mention this review the next time you come in, and we will give you a 10% discount on your purchase. Thanks again! 😁

name: Wanda Birge
text: Had a great time strolling through chatting with Chase!

resp.text: Thank you, Wanda!

name: Mike Lawrence
text: It was closed

resp.text: We are sorry that you missed us today, Mike. You are welcome to stop in during our posted business hours and give us another chance.

name: Leslie Hulsey
text: Mr. Cleckler was very knowledgeable and friendly he saved me from having to buy a new dryer.  Clecklers has almost every part available on site!!  I would definitely recommend visiting for all your appliance repair needs!!!!

name: Antonio Shelton
text: Very helpful. If you got a hard to find part. They are the place to go. I drive up from Wetumpka. Great place.

name: Jeff Smith
text: DO NOT TAKE YOUR ANYTHING HERE!! had them to check on my washer was told it was a electric board went to pick it up the door was busted screws was missing full of water and hoses missing!! I will contact the  BBB about this rip off

name: Ricky Wells
text: Very helpful great price

name: Michael Mims
text: Had exactly what i needed at a very decent price.

name: Stephanie Tate
text:
Day b4 thanksgiving my stove went out i ran up there they were closed

0but someone was there they let me in bought part fix my stove i was so thankful

name: Michelle Hughes
text: Beautiful woman being bullied by her hometown (and close to mine) in Clanton, Alabama.  Where is the justice for her?  80+ years old and put in jail for not being able to clean up outside the business ?  She was let out of jail, but the judge who ordered this should be fired.  You don't do that to the elderly!  You could have easily asked the community to help and we would have!  I'm sickened that this woman had to go through this.

name: K M
text: Terrible customer service both on the phone and in person. I went to the store, after trying to get the very older gentlemen and very older woman to understand what a slide-in electric oven is, to get a replacement part for my glass oven door, the older gentleman couldn't comprehend what I was saying and hung up on me 2x, verbally thinking I was making up stuff on the phone. Hoping that I could find someone possibly younger that works there that understood what I was talking about, I later took the specs, make, and model of the oven/oven door with me, to assist with possibly finding a glass oven door. This place is like a junk yard for appliances, so I thought surely they may have what I needed or something close. Maybe my experience would be better in person with tangible pictures and info to assist with what I needed. Unfortunately, the older gentleman proceeds to take the info I came with stating that he needed it to help locate what he may had amongst the numerous ovens located on site, yet he will just order it for me online. I mentioned to him I could personally order it online, yet wanted to see if they had something onsite instead. I also wanted to patronize a local business if I could. Anyways once he found the info, he told me he could get it in (order it) within a few days and I needed to put something on it before ordering (aka a deposit). I reminded him that I stated I could personally order it online yet asked if he had anything on site. The older gentleman then became very irate and rude. He started making off the wall comments about how I broke my oven door, and other rude comments as if he knew me personally. Very unprofessional to say the least. Cats were coming in and out of the store and they all over the countertops where we were. I felt like it was time to go. It was my mistake for trying to shop in this county. A simple yes or no, or I cannot or would not look outside would have sufficed. I am unsure as to how these older people are operating this business with lack of knowledge of up-to-date appliances (told 2x I was playing on the phone when I stated I had a kenmore electric slide in range) and how are they operating with very poor customer service. Regardless of who they know to operate here in this good ole boy town, they are a poor representation for how the business looks very close to restaurants and to their customer service.

name: b c
text:
Randy and "Mom" are a heck of a team, He can fix anything. I've bought from them for 40 years. They can help with any appliance and will treat you right.
Barry

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: Good people being victimized by an evil town!!!  Where are the Duke Boys to bring Boss Hogg down a notch?!!!!

name: Justin Lasiter
text: Nice owners and very informative!

name: Dana Wilson
text: Great friendly and family like service!!

name: John Jackson
text: Great customer service

name: Gary Grimes
text: Pieces you won't find anywhere else

name: robert stiles
text: Decent selection, the manager said more is on the way soon. Prices are pretty high though. You want to bargain you have to wait a month or so after it's been there a while.

name: Steve Smith
text: Great selection consignment furniture and home items. Great prices and welcome

resp.text: Thank you 😊

name: Allison Files
text: Area 59 used furniture is so great! Their furniture selection is great and all the furniture is in excellent condition for half the price of what you would pay at a furniture store. And the owners are absolutely wonderful. So nice, friendly, and honest. I won’t shop anywhere else for furniture but at Area 59!

resp.text: Thank you Allison,  you are such a pleasure working with 😊

name: Bobbi Fazekas McGhee
text: Love the great selection of furnishings. One of my favorite consignment stores to shop when I'm looking for furniture.  Lisa and Tony have really impressed me with the cleanliness and order of their store!

resp.text: Thank you Bobbi, we love having you as a customer and friend ❤❤

name: Ashleigh Osborne
text: Love this place and the owners. I’ve been looking over the past year here and there and we’ve finally bought a home to fill with beautiful unique pieces. I’ll be back next week after we close to load up! Great prices, unique pieces, high quality and very friendly and helpful service always!

name: Rose Brauchler
text:
Quality Furniture Own by a Nice Couple
This is not a trifht store; They also take Consecion

resp.text: Thank you 😊

name: Tonya Medina
text:
The lady owner is the sweetest person
I will be back. Looking for a fireplace in white. It had been sold. I went to Lowes got one there. I always come in and look

resp.text: Thank you Tonya, looking forward to seeing you again 🤗

name: Bao Anh Dinh
text: There are many used furnitures to buy, reasonable price and good qualified furnitures and stuffs. I often pass by to have looks on the new inventory

name: Tim White
text: Honest and surprisingly effective. Sold our furniture in weeks. I wouldn’t bother with Sweet Repeats. They can’t touch 59 consignment.

resp.text: Thank you so much

name: Ron Mackey
text: We went there looking for a good deal on different pieces of furniture. The owners we very knowledgeable and had incredible deals. There store was well stocked and had a great variety. We ended up getting a wonderful recliner at a fair price.

resp.text: Thank you,  we appreciate your buisness.

name: J&P Conner
text: We bought a table and chairs from this store a couple months ago.  After we got it home within  one week a leg gave way on one of the chairs and yesterday another chair broke.  You cannot put any weight on the edge of the table, like pushing yourself up from the table, or it will flip. My husband tried to fix the chair legs but it looks to be stripped from the screws.  I called and the owner said she could have her husband look at it but nothing else could be done because they were a consignment and not the owners.  She was very nice but We know the chairs cannot be repaired. We don't,  even feel safe sitting in them.  Although I know they will not reinburse us or give us a credit I am still very disappointed.  I guess it's our fault we didn't look at the set more carefully for quality.

resp.text: I understand that you are disappointed. I offered you on the phone to let my husband look at the chairs to see if there was something he could do. I requested photos of the table and chairs to see what we could do. I don't understand giving a bad rating when I offered to help. My husband and I don't know what table you purchased without the pictures I requested.

name: TK
text: I stopped in today for a quick look.  It is definitely worth a visit to see if they might have what you are looking for.  The owner is very nice and all the furniture and accessories seem of high quality and very good condition.  They have something for every room in the house, and no junk here.

resp.text: Thank you, appreciate your positive feedback..hope to see you back in soon 😊😊

name: Dean Watts
text: Really a neat place. Huge building with quite a variety of quality used furniture. No thrift store junk .... just a lot of medium to high end gently used quality furniture at really great prices. Most of the items are consignment, the selection is huge. They sell a lot of furniture .... so they are getting new items in daily. Lisa & Tony, the owners, are really good to deal with.!

resp.text: Thank you so much Dean, we appreciate your feedback and buisness 😊😊

name: DavidSAPIN Sapin
text: Great store with amazing prices. I love my leather sectional and wine buffet that I got there. They carry very high end furniture not like the other furniture consignment stores that are in Gulf Shores and Orange Beach that seems to carry only very used rental furniture.  Lisa and Tony are extremely knowledge and very friendly to work with. They also delivery the furniture to your home. I also have had some of my furniture consigned with them and the transaction was wonderful. I rate this furniture consignment store 5 stars ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

resp.text: Thank you so much. We so appreciate your buisness 😁😁

name: Mark Prondzinski
text: Nice selection, helpful staff, good deals! Plus, the longer an item has been on display, the larger the discount!!😀

resp.text: Thanks Mark, we appreciate your buisness 😊

name: Monica Willis
text: The owners are very friendly and helpful! The furniture is excellent quality for used/consignment furniture. I’m in there weekly just looking around and their stock is always different. That tells me they are selling! And the prices can’t be beat!

resp.text: Thank you 😊😊

name: M Sylvester
text:
What a great place to shop !!
Wonderful owners who are on site with no pressure sales and helpful suggestions !!
I think I’ve found not only a great store but new friends as well ❤️

resp.text: Thank you so much, we enjoyed your visit. Hope to see you again soon ❤❤

name: Kar N
text:
Nice quality furnishings, etc. Lisa and Tony were friendly and helpful. They answered all my questions.
I don't know why someone would call them "creepy"...so not true!
And Lisa was helpful with me...and I am a woman. I will definitely shop there again!

resp.text: Karen, thank you so much. It was a pleasure helping you 😁😁

name: Thomas Ray
text: I saw this store on a buy, sell or trade page and stopped by just to look what they had to offer. The quality of the furniture and art surprised me.. The owners Miss Lisa and Mr. Tony was on hand to answer any questions I had but was not pushy at all.. The art I've purchased from them (6 or 7) pieces now.. They have always looked up the artist on Google to give me all the information that was available. I recommend this store 100% and will look there before going anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you so much Thomas, it has be a pleasure having you as a customer 😊

name: Rich Woodall
text: We had a great experience. Tony and Lisa were very friendly and we are very excited about the couch we purchased. Would highly recommend them for any of your home furnishing needs.

resp.text: Thank you do much, we so appreciate your buisness 😊

name: Elizabeth Carlin
text:
We have bought furniture their on many occasions and were very pleased with quality as well as prices.
The owners are super and so accommodating.

resp.text: Thank you so much for you buisness and kind words.

name: Angela Calascione
text: Nice furniture. Reasonably priced. Friendly atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you 😊

name: Penny Mirocha
text: Nice bedroom sets and dining room sets too. Reasonable prices!!!

the store was well laid out and i found it pleasant to shop.

i liked the location of the store.

name: Cheryl Cook
text: Closing

name: Rosemary Clark
text: Best used and new furniture store around!!! They have everything from dressers, mattresses, chairs, couches, coffee tables and even paintings! Went in for a dresser yesterday after looking at multiple stores and antique shops and found an incredibly beautiful dresser here for a very affordable price. The lady that cashed me out was super nice and the gentleman there was so accommodating in helping us look for what we were looking for and then actually helped us haul the dresser to our truck. Definitely going to be our new furniture store!

name: John Hawron
text: A great and affordable place to buy all kinds of furniture and appliances for the home! They have a wide variety of home furniture including beds dressers and kitchen sets as well appliances of every kind. Everything is good quality and very affordable. They will help you load whatever you buy as well. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Sorry you think so.  But we do sell new and used items  all new and scratch and dent items are marked 1/2 price of regular retail stores but we appreciate the feedback.

name: Stacey Smith
text: Great folks treat you like family. Great deals too! Beautiful retro decor. Gorgeous sets of, your great grandmother's dishes, carnival glass, war relics. Arts and craft supplies, home improvements, from breakers to light fixtures. And a pet section too. Oh yes power tools. I can get lost,all day, in this establishment.

name: Frederick Joe Johnston
text: Much more than I expected in this huge second hand store. As for female clothing and items, there was something interesting  because I had to make two trips back in to retrieve my girlfriend. I went in for a motorcycle helmet and left with one. So being the simple man I am,  I'm happy. There was many manly  things ( ie. -Tools, electronics) I would have taken closer look at , but it can get expensive shopping with female,  so it will have to be another time.

text: The ladies here are always very nice and helpful and the place is kept very clean

name: Wriston Helms
text:
Not open to posted hours. Went 3 times, not open.
Update. They come back at my review with a snarky protest and suggest I can't read their sign or tell time.. Nice..
I assure you I can do both well.

The take-home message here is to check their Facebook page to see if they are following their own hours before you drive to the store.
Got it?

resp.text: Our hours are clearly posted on our facebook pg and on our front door of biz as being Tuesday through Saturday 10am to 5pm. If we ever have to close early, we make a sign on the door and post to social media. If we can't get up there we post to social media only. It's a shame that people have to leave vague negative reviews when we rarely close during our regular posted biz hours. If this person would've contacted us after "missing" us the first time we would have done what ever needed to be done to assist this potential customer but odds are they came on a day we are closed (always closed Sunday and monday) or they came after 5pm. It's that simple. I have documented time sheets that prove when our biz is open and many, many days we rarely close right at 5pm to accomodote shoppers in the store!

name: Amanda Sanford
text: Staff was so nice

name: Tonya Medina
text: Merry Christmas Brandi

name: Billy Dodson

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and yes, don't blink or you will miss us. But, once you know where we are, you'll be baaacckkk. We put out new treasures, daily. Thanks again.
